Until the 1970s, Western Australia stole the wages of thousands of Aboriginal workers. It’s been waiting for them to die rather than pay back.

Israel plans to demolish up to 17,000 structures, most of them on privately owned Palestinian land in the part of the illegally occupied West Bank under full Israeli military and civil rule, a UN report has found.

Scientists in Germany have come up with a method for extracting germanium from plants. Nowadays, silicon-germanium alloy is indispensable to modern life, crucial in making computers, smartphones and fiber-optic cables.

A former Dragons' Den star has been charged with child sex offences. Doug Richard, who acted as an adviser to Prime Minister David Cameron, is accused of three counts of sexual activity with a child and one of causing or inciting a child to engage in sexual activity, the Press Association reports.
Six members of an Asian child sex abuse gang are jailed for a total of 82 years after grooming white girls for sex in exchange for a 'milkshake or McDonald’s'
